trans-unit.source: This binding element can be used to enable Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) applications to send messages to and receive messages from existing MSMQ applications that use either COM, MSMQ native APIs, or the APIs in <see cref="N:System.Messaging" />.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定元素可用于使 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 应用程序发送消息到满足以下条件的现有 MSMQ 应用程序或接受来自这些应用程序的消息：或者使用 COM、MSMQ 本机 API，或者使用 <see cref="N:System.Messaging" /> 中的 API。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to send and receive messages from MSMQ-based messaging applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类可以向基于 MSMQ 的消息应用程序发送消息，或从这些应用程序接收消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel factory.
trans-unit.target: 用以生成通道工厂的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Builds a channel factory using the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的上下文生成通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: An MSMQ integration channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing MSMQ applications.
trans-unit.target: 可用于创建可向现有 MSMQ 应用程序发送消息的通道的 MSMQ 集成通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: This method builds a channel factory that enables the developer to create a client channel to communicate with a service.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可生成通道工厂，这样开发人员就可创建客户端通道，从而与服务进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The channel factory is not a channel, but rather a factory that can create a channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道工厂不是一个通道，而是一个能够创建通道的工厂。

trans-unit.source: You create a channel by calling `IChannelFactory<TChannel>.CreateChannel`.
trans-unit.target: 您可通过调用 `IChannelFactory<TChannel>.CreateChannel` 来创建通道。

trans-unit.source: The context value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 上下文值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="TChannel" /> is not <see langword="IOutputChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TChannel" /> 不为 <see langword="IOutputChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode" /> is Certificate or WindowsDomain and <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel" /> is None.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode" /> 为 Certificate 或 WindowsDomain，而 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel" /> 为 None。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel listener.
trans-unit.target: 用以生成通道侦听器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Builds a channel listener using the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的上下文生成通道侦听器。

trans-unit.source: An MSMQ integration channel listener that can be used to create channels to receive messages from existing MSMQ applications.
trans-unit.target: 可用于创建可从现有 MSMQ 应用程序接收消息的通道的 MSMQ 集成通道侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Channel listeners are created on the service and are used to receive messages sent by a client channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道侦听器在服务端创建，用于接收客户端通道发送的消息。

trans-unit.source: The service must call `IChannelListener.Open` and then `IChannelListener.AcceptChannel` to get a reference to the actual channel.
trans-unit.target: 该服务必须先调用 `IChannelListener.Open`，接着调用 `IChannelListener.AcceptChannel`，以获取实际通道的引用。

trans-unit.source: Then `IChannel.Open` must be called to open the channel.
trans-unit.target: 然后，必须调用 `IChannel.Open` 来打开通道。

trans-unit.source: At this point, the channel can be used to retrieve messages.
trans-unit.target: 此时，该渠道就可用于检索消息了。

trans-unit.source: The context value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 上下文值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="TChannel" /> is not <see langword="IInputChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TChannel" /> 不为 <see langword="IInputChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode" /> is Certificate or WindowsDomain and <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel" /> is None.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode" /> 为 Certificate 或 WindowsDomain，而 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel" /> 为 None。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel factory.
trans-unit.target: 用以生成通道工厂的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether you can build a channel factory with the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否能够使用提供的上下文生成通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you can build a channel factory with the context provided; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果利用所提供的上下文可生成通道工厂，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> only if <paramref name="TChannel" /> is <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <see langword="true" /> 为 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 时，此方法才返回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel listener.
trans-unit.target: 用以生成通道侦听器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether you can build a channel listener with the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否能够使用提供的上下文生成通道侦听器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you can build a channel listener with the context provided; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果利用所提供的上下文可生成通道侦听器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> only if <paramref name="TChannel" /> is <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <see langword="true" /> 为 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 时，此方法才返回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a clone of the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 返回绑定元素的复本。

trans-unit.source: A clone of the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素的复本。

trans-unit.source: The type of property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context.
trans-unit.target: 绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets a property of the requested type from the specified <see langword="BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的 <see langword="BindingContext" /> 获取请求类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <paramref name="T" /> 类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method provides the functionality to retrieve capabilities and protection requirements from the element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可检索来自该元素的功能和保护要求。

trans-unit.source: Context is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 上下文为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the scheme used by the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，它包含绑定元素所使用的方案。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the scheme used by the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 包含绑定元素使用的方案的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the string "msmq.formatname" to indicate the addressing scheme used by the MSMQ integration channel.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可返回字符串“msmq.formatname”，从而指示 MSMQ 集成通道所使用的寻址方案。

trans-unit.source: For more information about queue addressing, see [Service Endpoints and Queue Addressing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关队列寻址的详细信息，请参阅[服务终结点和队列寻址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" /> to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在序列化 MSMQ 消息时使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" /> to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.
trans-unit.target: 要在序列化 MSMQ 消息时使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can have one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以具有下列值之一：

trans-unit.source: `ActiveX` - The ActiveX serializer is used to serialize objects.
trans-unit.target: `ActiveX` - ActiveX 序列化程序用于序列化对象。

trans-unit.source: `Binary` - The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> is used to serialize objects.
trans-unit.target: `Binary` - <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> 用于序列化对象。

trans-unit.source: `ByteArray` - The object is serialized to an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: `ByteArray` - 将对象序列化为一个字节数组。

trans-unit.source: `Stream` - The object is serialized to a stream.
trans-unit.target: `Stream` - 将对象序列化为流。

trans-unit.source: `Xml` - The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> is used to serialize objects.
trans-unit.target: `Xml` - <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 用于序列化对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Xml`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `Xml`。

trans-unit.source: The value is not within the values of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: 值不在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" /> 值的范围内。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that contain the types to which messages should be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组，这些对象包含消息反序列化的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains the types to which messages should be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 包含消息反序列化的目标类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的数组。

trans-unit.source: The body of an MSMQ message is not typed.
trans-unit.target: MSMQ 消息的正文未类型化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement.TargetSerializationTypes%2A> property enables you to specify the types to which messages are deserialized when they are sent from an MSMQ application to a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] receiving application.
trans-unit.target: 您可利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement.TargetSerializationTypes%2A> 属性，指定在从 MSMQ 应用程序向 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 接收应用程序发送消息时，消息应反序列化为何种类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only if <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat> is set to `Xml`.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat> 设置为 `Xml` 时，才使用此属性。
